content: piece of waste 5 row in stockinette yarn through the stitch to be marked as a guide row 37 k1 k2tog k5 3 times k1 20 sts for inserting the eyes when making up row 38 to 42 starting on a ws purl row work stockinette 5 row in stockinette also known as stocking stitch knit rs row and row 43 k1 k2tog k4 3 times k1 17 sts purl ws row row 44 to 46 starting on a ws purl row work 3 row in stockinette row 47 k1 k2tog k3 3 times k1 14 sts row 48 purl row 49 k1 k2tog k2 3 times k1 11 sts carrot page 2 of 3 copyright © 2020 amanda berry row 50 purl making up row 51 k1 k2tog k1 3 times k1 8 sts remove the stitch markers and insert the toy safety eyes 6 sts apart on the centre front row 52 purl sew the side edges of the carrot together row 53 k1 k2tog 3 times k1 5 sts adding stuffing as you sew and gather the cast pull through to cast off on sts together at the top to finish for each stalk sew the side edges and sew the stalks cast on edge onto the top of the carrot make 3 cast on 6 sts in green yarn on straight 2 75mm needles start at the stalk row 1 to 20 starting on a rs knit row work 20 row in stockinette pull through to cast off carrot page 3 of 3 copyright © 2020 amanda berry
